title: Luxurious 4 Bedroom Private Beachfront Pool Villa in Lamai
description:
Key Features
•	4 bedroom, 4 bathroom beachfront villa with direct beach access
•	Large infinity pool overlooking the Gulf
•	Expansive sun deck and cabana area
•	Indoor–outdoor living spaces
•	Gourmet kitchen and separate prep kitchen
•	Private spa services available
•	Land area: 1,200 sqm
•	Built area: 750 sqm
